accessor to the map to other classes.

Overrides the parse method of abstract class Parser.

I

ie.gmit.dip - package ie.gmit.dip

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class ie.gmit.dip.Runner
Executes the entire application, by invoking show() method of Menu class.
Menu - Class in ie.gmit.dip
Provides a menu to the user, where the user can choose an option, and press enter to continue.
Menu() - Constructor for class ie.gmit.dip.Menu
 

P

parse() - Method in class ie.gmit.dip.GoogleWordsParser
Reads the google-1000 words text file line by line, put the words to the ConcurrentHasMap as key-value pair and adds each words to the HashSet.
parse() - Method in class ie.gmit.dip.InputTextParser
Uses the ThesaurusParser to access the map that stores each word and its google value, checks each word of the text for a google value and swap if found one, otherwise retain the word and prints the result.
parse() - Method in class ie.gmit.dip.Parser
parse the user input, differs the way according to the classes inherit the method.
parse() - Method in class ie.gmit.dip.ThesaurusParser
Reuses the GoogleWordsParser for its map and set.
Parser - Class in ie.gmit.dip
An abstract class, with a default behavior parse It is up to the classes which inherit this method to determine how to do the parsing.
Parser() - Constructor for class ie.gmit.dip.Parser
Creates a new Parser object.

R

Runner - Class in ie.gmit.dip
The class with the main method, the application starts its execution, when the main method invokes show() methodof Menu class.
Runner() - Constructor for class ie.gmit.dip.Runner
 

S

setFile(String) - Method in class ie.gmit.dip.GoogleWordsParser
Sets the value of the static variable file.
setFile(String) - Method in class ie.gmit.dip.ThesaurusParser
Sets the value of the static variable file.
show() - Method in class ie.gmit.dip.Menu
Invoked from main method of Runner class, displays the menu options to the user, until the user enter the option-4.

T

ThesaurusParser - Class in ie.gmit.dip
Overrides the parse method .Forms the mapping of Thesaurus words to google words by accessing the map and set from GoogleWordsParser (dependency).
ThesaurusParser() - Constructor for class ie.gmit.dip.ThesaurusParser
Creates a new ThesaurusParser object
ThesaurusParser(String) - Constructor for class ie.gmit.dip.ThesaurusParser
Creates a new ThesaurusParser object.
